channel.title: Few Questions On RSCA Source
channel.description:
ok i have a few questions on rsca source
How Do i get p2p working? like when i change it to runp2p in run server.bat it gives me an error, see bottom of page,
than another question is
if i can make new ranks?
[code]Buildfile: build.xml
runp2p: [java] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 2 [java] at rsca.gs.Server.main(Server.java:46) [java] Java Result: 1
BUILD SUCCESSFUL Total time: 0 seconds Press any key to continue . . . [/code]

item.title: Few Questions On RSCA Source
item.dc:creator: @GothKing5000 GothKing5000
item.description:
@GothKing5000 wrote:

yea… just track down where it pulls from player table for value rank from sql and add in new values to the case statement… that it checks sql values against and poof new ranks.

Read full topic
